subject: Add interactive user tutorial for first-time onboarding
body:
Implement a comprehensive 8-step tutorial system that automatically shows on first app launch to help new users understand SyncTone's unique features.

Features:
- Auto-shows on first launch, dismissable, and re-accessible via help button
- 8 tutorial steps covering: welcome, creating chats, joining chats, tone tags, familiar features, unique features, privacy, and completion
- Help button (‚ùì) in home screen header allows users to re-access tutorial anytime
- Tutorial state persisted in SecureStore (native) or AsyncStorage (web)
- Step navigation with progress bar, dot indicators, and smooth transitions
- Skip functionality for returning users

Components:
- TutorialModal: Multi-step modal with navigation and progress tracking
- useTutorial hook: Manages tutorial state and auto-show logic
- Tutorial constants: 8 detailed step definitions with icons and descriptions

Technical implementation:
- Tutorial completion state stored via TUTORIAL_COMPLETED_KEY in platform-aware storage
- Functions: hasTutorialCompleted(), markTutorialCompleted(), resetTutorial()
- Integrated into home screen with conditional rendering based on completion state
title: Add interactive user tutorial for first-time onboarding
